member.name: FILE_MAKE_COMPATIBLE_BUFFER
member.summary: Specifies the disc to close the current session for. This control code is used for UDF file systems. This structure is used for input when calling FSCTL_MAKE_MEDIA_COMPATIBLE.

member.name: FILE_MAKE_COMPATIBLE_BUFFER.CloseDisc
member.summary: If TRUE, indicates the media should be finalized. No new data can be appended to the media.
